column4: im trying to get my sound to work, i have an audigy card, i try to modprobe emu101k and it says it doest exist
for some reason it looks like my ubuntu install is missing the module emu101k...when i try to modprobe it it says it doesnt exist, any suggestions?
i got my box to start using kdm instead of gdm....but when i login it still loads up gnome...what file do i edit to fix that?
on the login screen change your system login to kde
